title: Is Microsoft Corp (MSFT) Stock Worth a Buy Thursday?
text:
Microsoft Corp (MSFT) stock has gained 66.68% over the last 12 months, and the average rating from Wall Street analysts is a Strong Buy. InvestorsObserver’s proprietary ranking system, gives MSFT stock a score of  71 out of a possible 100. 





That rank is primarily influenced by a long-term technical score of 90. MSFT's rank also includes a short-term technical score of 82. 






 MSFT has an Overall Score of 71. Find out what this means to you and get the rest of the rankings on MSFT!
See Full MSFT Report


What's Happening with MSFT Stock Today
Microsoft Corp (MSFT) stock has gained 0.92% while the S&P 500 has gained 0.79% as of 3:19 PM on Thursday, Jan 18. MSFT has gained $3.57 from the previous closing price of $389.47 on volume of 13,666,681 shares. Over the past year the S&P 500 has gained 21.58% while MSFT has gained 66.68%. MSFT earned $10.33 a per share in the over the last 12 months, giving it a price-to-earnings ratio of 38.05.
